answers.answer: The symptom you are describing sounds of concern. Make sure to inform her doctor right away and also seek  immediate medical help in the meantime if they are not available.  Be sure to bring a full list of her medications and any information about her medical conditions with you if she would need to go to the hospital or e.r.
